alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 1:25PM CDT until April 15 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL BARTON AND NORTH CENTRAL JASPER COUNTIES... At 124 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Jasper, or 9 miles southwest of Lamar, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Golf ball size hail was reported just north of Nashville Missouri. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prairie State Park, Lamar, Jasper, Nashville, Lamar Heights, Irwin, Oakton, Iantha and Boston. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 56 and 76. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
